text:
Rosa María Ortiz Ríos (9 September 1955 – 20 September 2020) was a Peruvian lawyer and politician. She was Minister of Energy and Mines between 17 February 2015 until 28 July 2018 during the Ollanta Humala presidency. Ortiz Ríos was born in Lima, Peru.
Ortiz Ríos died on 20 September 2020 in Lima at the age of 65.
